author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Luka takes the field once again, joined by Shawn from Iowa, as the sacred ruins become the latest prize in a 600 point Ravage Star clash. The Amari march forward with their shield maidens, royal guard, and a rocket-wielding commander, while the Veil Touched creep in with mystics, dread terrors, and an Oathbor ready to turn everything into rubble.

The mission of the day? Unlimited Power. Which, of course, means exactly what it sounds like: objectives brimming with dangerous energy, boost tokens multiplying like grots in a Mek shop, and players daring each other to pull from the bag of chaos. Expect reckless charges, suspiciously durable shield maidens, lightning troopers who may or may not have struck a deal with the dice gods, and Luka questioning his math skills before his dice rolls. Will Shawn keep the ritual sites safe, or will the Veil Touched corrupt them beyond repair? Only one way to find out...

Members to watch the Post Game Show, go here
Youtube Members - https://youtu.be/
title: Veil-Touched vs Immari Ravaged Star Battle Report Ep 37
